{{Wired embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=CloudStor |revision=CS-WX/1D |asin=B004RFGK1W |newegg=N82E16822165290 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |price=130 |est_release_date=October 2011 |type=NAS enclosure |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=M25P40VP |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162FFR-S5C |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA II, |expansion_usb_num=1 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1118 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2A, 18V Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;1; ,,, 3A, 18V, 340KHz Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1484EN;;1; |flags=fan |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.8; |tp_firmware=Debian |oui_eth=4C:E6:76 }} {{TagLine|Buffalo CloudStor CS-WX}} :{{SupportPage|https://www.buffalo-technology.com/service-support/downloads/software-firmware-updates/}}
This unit appears to be identical to LS-WXL series but uses different software.
